4315940.name: SILVARN Demo
4315940.description:
STORY

As unexplained deaths begin to plague the place where Jacob’s family lives, they plead for him to come and take them away. But when Jacob arrives, the house is silent scattered belongings, interrupted traces… and his family is nowhere to be found.

The source of the terror soon becomes clear: a man detached from reality, plagued by severe psychological instability, convinced that the residents are cursed and must be punished. As Jacob follows the broken clues left behind, the darkness around him grows deeper.

While searching for his family, he encounters something that defies all reason a mysterious elevator whose doors open to different and unpredictable places each time. This strange mechanism seems to connect the fate of the missing with the madman’s twisted beliefs.

To uncover what happened to his family, Jacob must step through this unknown doorway and face whatever lies beyond.

THE ELEVATOR

Within the story, it serves as an irregular passage that links random locations together. Each time the doors open, they reveal a different environment sometimes the village square, sometimes the entrance to an abandoned room, or perhaps even a bathroom. Uncertainty is the only constant within this structure.

ESCAPE FROM DEATH

The moment Silvarn appears in the doorway, everything quickly slips out of control. As you move through narrow corridors beneath flickering lights, the heavy sound of his footsteps behind you grows more unsettling with each passing second.
Every turn holds a new danger, every door opens to an uncertain escape. Silvarn never slows down; every step you take walks the thin line between life and death.
It creates a relentless chase where the pressure never lets up, leaving you barely any room to breathe.

CORE FEATURES

  • Intense Atmosphere
    A suffocating environment set in a dark, sealed-off village where even the silence feels threatening.

  • Constant Sense of Pressure
    An unseen presence that grows closer with every step, creating an ongoing feeling of danger.

  • Visual Tension
    Cinematic camera work, realistic lighting, and detailed environments that reinforce the unsettling tone.

  • Lurking Threat
    Disturbed stranger wandering the village, leaving traces, sounds, and shadows that keep you on edge.

  • Story-Driven Puzzles
    Short, non-repetitive puzzles carefully tied to the narrative, deepening the mystery as you progress.
